name: Ducky Duck (A normal Mate, PointPogger)
description:
This game was made by me and PointPogger, originally was part of a 5 game bundle, but we decided to make it it's own.
We are sure you are not gonna regret playing this title.

This game is a found footage game. It features a polygonal style.

Controls:

WASD: Move
Mouse: Look around
Left Mouse Button: Interact
CTRL or C: Crouch
Shift: Run
